title: The Iridescent Butterfly: A Book of Twenty Short Stories
description: 'The Iridescent Butterfly' is a collection of short stories of mixed length covering many themes. From 'Secrets of the Antares', a story set in beautiful Greece which reveals an evil secret, to 'The Moving Pavilion' a very short story of broken allegiance and murder to 'The Faraday Affair' and 'Mansions of the Mind' this collection is as diverse as it is full of human interest. It includes three Arthurian Tales and a tale of a bygone era, 'The Glass Anvil'. This is an entertaining set of stories and not to be missed. It provides a companion volume to 'The Silk Peacock'.
author: Hilary West
